statements: DELETE FROM hazardous_waste WHERE industry_id = 5 AND waste_type = 'Chemical Waste'
DELETE FROM hazardous_waste WHERE industry_id = 1 AND waste_type = 'Biomedical' AND quantity > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM hazardous_waste WHERE waste_type = 'Chemical' AND quantity <= 500.00 AND industry_id = 2;
DELETE FROM hazardous_waste_quantities WHERE industry_id = 3 AND quantity < 100;
DELETE FROM hazardous_waste_quantities WHERE id = 5 AND industry_id = 3;
DELETE FROM hazardous_waste_types WHERE type_name = 'Chemical Waste';
DELETE FROM waste_generation WHERE type_id = 3 AND quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM hazardous_waste WHERE industry_id = 2 AND waste_type_id = 3;
